alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 3:03PM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THURSDAY TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Back and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM Thursday to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back
